original_title: Cartoon Craze Vol. 24 presents: Sing A-Longs
overview: These 9 episodes are all "Screen Songs," made by Famous Studios in the mid 20th century. All are crisply and colorfully drawn, and are delightful, if one takes them in the context of the era, because they have many elements that are now considered "politically incorrect."
title: Cartoon Craze Vol. 24 presents: Sing A-Longs
